title: Job Vacancies at Adenal Consulting
content:
Adenal Consulting is a Management and Human Resource Consulting firm that offers business advisory and consulting services to help small and medium-sized enterprises.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Driver

Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	We are seeking a responsible and reliable driver residing on the Island or close to the Island for immediate employment.


Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Interested candidates should possess an SSCE / GCE / NECO qualification 
	Minimum of 10years of driving experience.
	Applicants must have a valid driver’s license.
	Excellent knowledge of Lagos roads.


Application Closing Date: 20th October, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: adenalconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

2.) Accountant

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Prepare and examine accounting records, financial statements, and other financial reports to assess accuracy, completeness, and conformance to reporting and procedural standards.
	Manage all accounting transactions
	Ensure timely bank payments and monitor bank deposits.
	Handle monthly, quarterly, and annual closings.
	Reconcile accounts payable and receivable.
	Ensure timely submission of tax returns and liaise with external auditors during audits.
	Analyze financial information and summarize financial status.
	Prepare the schedules for statutory remittances (PAYE, WHT, Pension, Company tax, ITF, NSITF, among others) and ensuring timely remittance.
	Maintain a complete and accurate Fixed Asset Register for the company
	Provide technical support and advice on management.
	Participate in financial standards setting and in forecast process.
	Develop and document business processes and accounting policies to maintain and strengthen internal controls.


Requirements


	HND/Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance
	Minimum of 7 years of proven experience as an Accountant in a trading company or related industry.
	Must have ICAN certification
	Thorough knowledge of Accounting procedures and principles.
	Experience with general ledger functions and the month-end/year-end close process.
	Hands-on experience with accounting software packages
	Advanced MS Excel skills including Vlookups and pivot tables.
	Accuracy and attention to detail.
	Aptitude for numbers and quantitative skills.
	Excellent organizational and time-management abilities.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.


Application Closing Date: 24th October, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: adenalconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

3.) HR Business Partner

Job Location: Lagos

Key Responsibilities


	Partner with leadership to develop and implement HR strategies that support business objectives.
	Manage end-to-end recruitment, onboarding, and workforce planning for assigned teams.
	Provide guidance on employee relations, performance management, and talent development.
	Ensure compliance with Nigerian labor laws and international HR best practices.
	Analyze HR metrics and prepare reports to support decision-making.
	Drive employee engagement initiatives and foster a positive remote work culture.
	Act as the primary HR contact for assigned staff and management.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field (professional certifications such as CIPM, SHRM, or CIPD are an advantage).
	Minimum of 5years of progressive HR experience, with at least 2 years in a business partner or advisory capacity.
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian labor laws and HR practices; exposure to international HR is a plus.
	Excellent communication, advisory, and interpersonal skills.
	Strong problem-solving ability and business acumen.
	Tech-savvy with proficiency in MS Office and HR software tools.
	Ability to work independently, manage multiple priorities, and collaborate effectively across teams.


Application Closing Date: 10th October, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: adenalconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

     

    

        Click here to Apply

Unit Accountant Job at Sundry Foods Limited




        
    

        
        Sundry Foods is an integrated food services company founded in 2003 and operating in major cities in Nigeria. We are bringing our now trademark great tasting ready-to-eat food and quality services to thousands of people and institutions daily through its chain and network of restaurants, bakeries and other catering facilities.

We are proud to own and operate one of Africa’s best restaurant and bakery chains and we pride ourselves on our ability to consistently deliver original food and service solutions whether in workplaces, schools and colleges, hospitals, joining even remote sites and different cultural environments using our team of young seasoned professionals and an entire workforce with a passion to deliver nothing but the best to every customer.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Unit Accountant

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT); Aba, Abia; Enugu; Ibadan, Oyo; Ilesha, Osun; Lekki, Lagos; Owerri, Imo; Asaba, Delta; Onitsha, Anambra; and Port Harcourt, Rivers
Job Type: Full-Time

Responsibilites


	To represent the accounting and treasury functions at the unit level and safeguarding the company’s current assets as well as work that may be assigned to you by the Manager responsible for your primary assignment.


Requirements


	Required Qualification: First Degree in Accounting or Banking and Finance (B.Sc or HND) with a second class at a minimum
	Required Skill: Microsoft Excel Skills
	Extras: Working knowledge of an Accounting Software or ERP is an added advantage.
	Strong positive attitude.
	Resilient.
	Self-led and self-motivated.
